All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Action
Base class for Actions.
ActionList
A thin wrapper for java.util.ArrayList<Action> that does not allow nulls to be added.
Actor
An entity that is alive by having hit points.
ActorLocationsIterator
Represents a bimap of locations and actors.
Ally
Ally class - a friendly NPC which attacks other enemies, but not the player.
AoEBehaviour
A class that figures out if an aoe capable actor is able to perform their aoe attack
AoECapable
An interface that defines an object that is able to perform aoe attacks and actions
Application
 
Application
 
Application
The main class to start the game.
AreaAttack
A class that extends action and represents an area of effect attack.
Astrologer
The Bandit combat class, which has an Astrologer's staff and 396 HP.
AstrologerStaff
A weapon which can be bought and sold, wielded by Astrologers.
AttackAction
An Action to attack another Actor.
AttackBehaviour
A class figures out if an actor is able to attack anything in its vicinity
AxeOfGodrick
Godrick's phase one axe weapon, can perform a spinning attack Created by:
Bandit
The Bandit combat class, which has a Great Knife and 414 HP.
Barracks
 
Behaviour
Created by:
Bug
 
Cage
A spawner that spawns Dogs
CapabilitySet
A collection of Capability objects.
Capable
An interface for representing a collection of any kind of enum.
Cliff
A Ground that kills the player when they step off it
Club
A simple weapon that can be used to attack the enemy.
CombatClass
A combat class that each player must have.
CombatClassMenu
A simple I/O interface used to accept user input for a combat class.
Consumable
An interface for all items that can be consumed
ConsumeAction
An action that consumes one of the actors' consumable items.
ConwayGameMap
 
ConwayLocation
 
Crater
 
DeathAction
An action executed if an actor is killed.
DemoCapabilities
 
DespawnAction
An Action to despawn another Actor.
Dirt
A class that represents bare dirt.
Display
Class that manages I/O for the system
Dog
an enemy representing a dog in Stormveil castle Created by:
DoNothingAction
An Action that doesn't do anything.
DropAction
An abstract drop action class
DropItemAction
Special Action that allows Actors to drop items.
DropWeaponAction
Special Action that allows Actors to drop weapons.
Enemy
 
EnemyFactory
A factory for enemies, allows us to abstract the responsibility of creating enemies into a seperate class
Exit
Class that represents a route from one Location to another.
FancyGroundFactory
Class that can create different types of Ground based on the character that represents it.
FancyMessage
Fancy messages used to print the game title Font obtained from: invalid input: '&f'./game/utils/=Georgia11invalid input: '&t'./game/utils/=">... Font: Georgia11 Created by:
Flamethrower
An Action to perform an area attack with a flame weapon.
FlaskOfCrimsonTears
A flask which the player owns, that can be consumed to heal a certain amount.
Floor
 
Floor
 
Floor
A class that represents the floor inside a building.
FollowBehaviour
A class that figures out a MoveAction that will move the actor one step closer to a target Actor.
GameMap
Class representing one map within the system.
GiantCrab
An enemy that represents a Giant crab spawns from puddle of water on the west side of the map and is capable of performing a slam attack won't attack other crustaceans
GiantCrabClaw
Giant crab claw of the giant crab Only used in its slam attack It deals 208 damage with 90% hit rate
GiantCrayfish
An enemy that represents a Giant crayfish spawns from puddle of water on the east side of the map and is capable of performing a slam attack won't attack other crustaceans
GiantCrayfishPincer
Giant pincer of the giant crayfish Only used in its slam attack It deals 527 damage with 100% hit rate
GiantDog
An enemy that represents a Giant dog spawns from gust of wind on the east side of the map and is capable of performing a slam attack won't attack other canines
GiantDogHead
Giant head of the giant dog Only used in its slam attack It deals 314 damage with 90% hit rate
GiantEnemy
A class of enemies that implement aoe capable and can perform slam attacks with their giant bodies
GiantWeapon
A class of weapons that utilize the slam action important to note, these are weapons not weapon items, they function similarly to intrinsic weapons but are only returned in aoe capable enemies getAoEWeapon() method
GiveRunesAction
An action that gives runes to the player when runes are dropped.
GodrickSoldier
An enemy reprsenting a Godrick solder from Stormveil castle Created by:
GodrickTheGrafted
An enemy representing the boss Godrick the Grafted, 2 phase fight that triggers when enemy reaches half hp Created by:
GoldenFogDoor
A spawner that spawns Dogs
GoldenRune
A golden rune which, when consumed, gives player a random amount of runes.
GoldenSeed
A golden seed which, when consumed, increases the maximum amount of flasks a player can have.
GraftedDragon
Godrick's phase two flame weapon, can perform a flamethrower aoe attack Created by:
Graveyard
A class that extends spawner and represents a graveyard will spawn Heavy skeletal swordsmen on the west side of the map and skeleton bandits on the east
GreatKnife
A weapon which can be bought and sold, and has a special skill "Quickstep".
Grossmesser
Grossmesser weapon item used by heavy skeletal swordsmen It deals 115 damage with 85% hit rate also can be used to perform a spinning attack
Ground
Class representing terrain type
GroundFactory
Interface for factory classes used by GameMap to create new map locations.
GustOfWind
A class that extends spawner and represents a gust of wind will spawn lone wolves on the west side of the map and giant dogs on the east
HeavyCrossbow
Heavy Crossbow weapon item used by Godrick's soldiers It deals 64 damage with 57% hit rate
HeavySkeletalSwordsman
An enemy that represents a Heavy skeletal swordsman spawns from graveyard on the west side of the map and is capable of performing a spinning attack with its grossmesser won't attack other skeletons
IntrinsicWeapon
Class that represents a weapon for an unarmed Actor (e.g.
Invader
Invader class - a new type of enemy NPC which only despawns once the player dies.
Item
Abstract base class representing a physical object in the game world.
ItemFactory
A class used to generate Purchasable and Sellable objects.
ItemNameToType
A class used to match strings containing an item's name to a ItemType enum.
ItemStatus
Use this enum to show if an item can be purchased or sold.
ItemType
Use this enum to refer to a specific type of item.
KickAction
 
Location
Class representing a location in the game map.
LockedDoor
 
LoneWolf
BEHOLD, DOG! Enemy that represents a Lone wolf spawns from gust of wind on the west side of the map won't attack other canines
MartianItem
 
Menu
A menu GUI implementations
MoveActorAction
An Action that moves the Actor.
NpcManager
Used to generate NPCs.
NumberRange
A class that represents an array of sequential numbers.
PickUpAction
An abstract pick up action class
PickUpItemAction
Action to allow items to be picked up.
PickUpWeaponAction
Action to allow weapons to be picked up.
PileOfBones
An enemy that represents a Pile of bones spawned by skeletal enemies on death, does nothing for 3 turns before reviving into a new skeletal enemy
Player
Class representing the Player.
Player
Class representing the Player.
Player
Class representing the Player.
PreservingBolus
A bolus which, when consumed, cures the consumer of Scarlet Rot.
Printable
Things that are Printable can appear in the user interface and therefore can be represented by a character in the UI.
PuddleOfWater
A class that extends spawner and represents a puddle of water will spawn giant crab on the west side of the map and giant crayfish on the east
Purchasable
A purchasable interface Created by:
PurchasableWithItem
 
PurchaseAction
An Action to purchase an item from a Trader.
PurchaseWithItemAction
An Action to purchase an item from a Trader using an item.
Quickstep
An action representing a unique attack, where the attacker will move directly after attacking within the same turn.
RandomNumberGenerator
A random number generator Created by:
RecoverRunesAction
An action that allows the player to pick up a RunePile, recovering their lost runes from their most recent death.
RemembranceOfTheGrafted
Tradable item dropped by Godrick the Grafted, can be traded for his weapons at finger reader Enia Created by:
ResetAction
An action that allows the player to pick up a RunePile, recovering their lost runes from their most recent death.
ResetEvent
A simple enum that represents the event that caused a reset.
ResetManager
A reset manager class that manages a list of resettables.
Resettable
A resettable interface Created by:
RestAction
An action that allows the player to rest, resetting the game.
RotPuddle
 
Rune
Class used to represent runes, the in-game currency.
RuneManager
Class used to represent runes, the in-game currency.
RunePile
An item dropped during the player's death, which stores the runes they had.
SacredTear
A sacred tear which, when consumed, increases the potency of healing provided by a player's flasks.
Samurai
The Samurai combat class, which has an Uchigatana and 455 HP.
Scimitar
Scimitar weapon item used by skeletal bandits It deals 118 damage with 88% hit rate also can be used to perform a spinning attack
Sellable
A purchasable interface Created by:
SellingItemAction
An Action to sell an item to a Trader.
SellingWeaponAction
An Action to sell an item to a Trader.
SiteOfLostGrace
A special ground which allows the player to rest
SkeletalEnemy
A class of enemies who turn into a pile of bones on death before reviving Also implements AoECapable to perform their spinning attack
SkeletonBandit
An enemy that represents a Skeletal bandit spawns from graveyard on the west east of the map and is capable of performing a spinning attack with its scimitar won't attack other skeletons
Slam
A class that extends AreaAttack and represents an area attack using an actors giant weapon
SleepAction
 
Spawner
A class that represents a ground object that is capable of spawning an enemy makes use of the enemy factory to spawn most things
Species
Use this enum to assign an enemy a species
SpinningAttack
A class that extends AreaAttack and represents an area attack using a sword weapon item
SpitBehaviour
 
Status
 
Status
Use this enum class to give `buff` or `debuff`.
StatusEffect
Use this enum class to give status effects.
StatusEffectManager
Carries out the effects of status effects.
StatusEffectStrength
Use this enum to determine the strength of a status effect.
Stick
 
SummonAction
An action that allows the player to summon an NPC.
SummonSign
A ground that allows the player to summon an NPC.
Sword
A class of weapon items that utilize the spinning attack action
TradableItem
An item which can be bought and sold.
TradableWeapon
A weapon which can be bought and sold.
Trader
An entity that can sell or purchase items from players.
TravelAction
An Action to send an actor to another location or map.
Tree
WARNING: this might not be the best design to follow :)
Uchigatana
A weapon which can be bought and sold, and has a special skill "Unsheathe".
Unsheathe
An action representing a unique attack where the attacker deals double damage.

Interface for weapon items.
WeaponItem
Class representing items that can be used as a weapon.
WindowSmashAction
 
World
Class representing the game world, including the locations of all Actors, the player, and the playing grid.
Wretch
The Wretch combat class, which has a Club and 414 HP.
